author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Syrian Refugee Hala Kamil in Brandon Maxwell Oscars 2017 - Hala Kamil in Brandon Maxwell Oscars 2017
text: Hala Kamil, a Syrian refugee and star of the Oscar-nominated short documentary Watani: My Homeland , stood out on last night's red carpet in a custom Brandon Maxwell look that comes with a moving backstory. Kamil, who's the subject of the documentary that follows one family's escape from war-ridden Syria into Germany, almost couldn't make it to the Oscars due to Trump's travel ban, according to Refinery 29 . Kamil's travel restrictions were up in limbo until a few days agoâ€”leaving her with no dress options when she finally found out she could attend the big night.
